repository.description: Turbolinks makes following links in your web application faster (use with Rails Asset Pipeline)

shas:
Clarify "the html element" for progress bars

When I first read "the progress bar is implemented on the html element" I thought, "What html element?" I think this change makes it a bit clearer that it's the actually the `<html>` tag

Merge pull request #417 from smidwap/patch-1

Clarify "the html element" for progress bars

shas: Add an opt-in progress bar to show XHR loading status
Guard against calling #done when there's no value
Force repaint so IE reflects opacity change
Add a slow response for testing / visualizing the progress bar

repository.name: turbolinks
repository.description: Turbolinks makes following links in your web application faster (use with Rails Asset Pipeline)

pull_request.title: Progress bar
pull_request.body:
Adds an optional, customizable, in-browser progress bar to display page loading progress.

Seen here in Chrome:
![progress-bar-chrome](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5355/4721418/b8d690e0-5938-11e4-890a-abaecff9397b.gif)
Also tested in: [Safari](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5355/4721477/18530c24-5939-11e4-8ffc-48d20e55e247.gif), [Firefox](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5355/4721516/47389dc4-5939-11e4-8f19-d5f2d6acb38e.gif), [IE 11](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5355/4721522/53e25bbe-5939-11e4-99b1-45b5309e49dd.gif), and [IE 10](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5355/4721532/5eee657a-5939-11e4-8194-b6fa5deaccd3.gif).

pull_request.title: allow overriding sub job queue_adapter without affecting the base job or...

comment.diff_hunk:
@@ -5,11 +5,18 @@ module ActiveJob
   module QueueAdapter
     extend ActiveSupport::Concern
 
+    included do
+      class_attribute :_queue_adapter
+      self._queue_adapter = ActiveJob::QueueAdapters::InlineAdapter unless self._queue_adapter?
comment.body: When would the queue_adapter already have been set at this point? Don't think you need that `unless` guard.

pull_request.title: allow overriding sub job queue_adapter without affecting the base job or...
